00020 #include "AudioStreamView.h"
00021 
00022 
00023 CAudioStreamView* CAudioStreamView::NewL(const TRect & aRect, 
00024                                                                                  CAudioStreamEngine* aEngine)
00025         {
00026         CAudioStreamView* self = NewLC(aRect, aEngine);
00027         CleanupStack::Pop(self);
00028         return self;
00029         }
00030 
00031 CAudioStreamView* CAudioStreamView::NewLC(const TRect & aRect, 
00032                                                                                   CAudioStreamEngine* aEngine)
00033         {
00034         CAudioStreamView* self = new (ELeave) CAudioStreamView();
00035         CleanupStack::PushL(self);
00036         self->ConstructL(aRect, aEngine);
00037         return self;
00038         }
00039 
00040 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 // CAudioStreamView::ConstructL(const TRect& aRect, 
00042 //                                                                CAudioStreamEngine* aEngine)
00043 //
00044 // Standard EPOC 2nd phase constructor
00045 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 void CAudioStreamView::ConstructL(const TRect& aRect, 
00047                                                                   CAudioStreamEngine* aEngine)
00048         {
00049         iEngine = aEngine;
00050         // create new window,
00051     CreateWindowL();
00052         // create label to display status to user
00053     iLabel = new (ELeave) CEikLabel;
00054     iLabel->SetContainerWindowL( *this );
00055         #ifndef __SERIES60_3X__
00056                 // The default font is too big in 2nd Edition devices
00057             iLabel->SetFont( LatinBold12() );      
00058         #endif
00059     // set window size
00060     SetRect(aRect);
00061 
00062         _LIT(KInfo, "Audio streaming example\n");
00063     iLabel->SetTextL( KInfo );
00064 
00065     // activate window
00066     ActivateL();    
00067         }
00068 
00069 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 // CAudioStreamView::CAudioStreamView()
00071 //
00072 // constructor
00073 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 CAudioStreamView::CAudioStreamView():
00075     iLabel(NULL)
00076         {
00077         }
00078 
00079 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 // CAudioStreamView::~CAudioStreamView()
00081 //
00082 // destructor
00083 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 CAudioStreamView::~CAudioStreamView()
00085         {
00086     delete iLabel;
00087     iLabel=NULL;
00088         }
00089 
00090 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 // CAudioStreamView::SizeChanged()
00092 //
00093 // called by framework when the view size is changed
00094 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 void CAudioStreamView::SizeChanged()
00096         {
00097     iLabel->SetRect( Rect() );
00098         }
00099 
00100 // ---------------------------------------------------------
00101 // CAudioStreamView::HandleResourceChange()
00102 // Called by framework when resource is changed.
00103 // ---------------------------------------------------------
00104 //
00105 void CAudioStreamView::HandleResourceChange(TInt aType)
00106     {
00107     CCoeControl::HandleResourceChange(aType);
00108 
00109     // ADDED FOR SCALABLE UI SUPPORT
00110     // *****************************
00111     if ( aType==KEikDynamicLayoutVariantSwitch )
00112         {
00113         TRect rect;
00114         AknLayoutUtils::LayoutMetricsRect(AknLayoutUtils::EMainPane, rect);
00115         SetRect(rect);
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119 
00120 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 // CAudioStreamView::CountComponentControls() const
00122 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00123 TInt CAudioStreamView::CountComponentControls() const
00124         {
00125     return 1;   // return number of controls inside this container
00126         }
00127 
00128 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 // CAudioStreamView::ComponentControl(TInt aIndex) const
00130 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 CCoeControl* CAudioStreamView::ComponentControl(TInt aIndex) const
00132         {
00133     switch ( aIndex )
00134                 {
00135         case 0:
00136             return iLabel;
00137         default:
00138             return NULL;
00139             }
00140         }
00141 
00142 
00143 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 // CAudioStreamView::Draw(const TRect& aRect) const
00145 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 void CAudioStreamView::Draw( const TRect& aRect ) const
00147         {
00148     CWindowGc& gc = SystemGc();   
00149     gc.SetPenStyle( CGraphicsContext::ENullPen );
00150     gc.SetBrushColor( KRgbWhite );
00151     gc.SetBrushStyle( CGraphicsContext::ESolidBrush );
00152     gc.DrawRect( aRect );
00153         }

00159 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 void CAudioStreamView::HandleControlEventL(
00161     CCoeControl* /*aControl*/,TCoeEvent /*aEventType*/)
00162         {
00163         }

00166 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00167 // CAudioStreamView::ShowMessageL(const TDesC& aMsg)
00168 //
00169 // displays status messages to user
00170 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 void CAudioStreamView::ShowMessageL(const TDesC& aMsg)
00172         {
00173         iLabel->SetTextL(aMsg);
00174         DrawNow();
00175         }
